lines.text: This was, I believe, the first recorded instance of a CIA agent being eaten alive by a rainbow trout!
I got your ball, now let me in.
The couple that spies together, dies together.

[after he fires at the door that didn't explode]
Big Door!

[after explaining to Leonard why replacing the fluids with dishwashing liquid made no difference]
I could put Yoo Hoo in this and it would work.

[slurring from rain pouring on face]
If I save the verld... would you move back in with me?
